title: Thunderbird improvvisamente bloccato
content: Ciao a tutti, ho cercato precedentemente se ci fosse una problematica simile recente ma non l'ho trovata In sintesi da ieri thunderbird risultava piuttosto lento e ogni tanto si bloccava per qualche secondo, per poi tornare a lavorare normale. Stamattina invece le interruzioni sono diventate sempre più lunghe costringendomi a dover riavviare il programma perchè bloccato per diversi minuti. Cercando in rete sembrava fosse un problema di indicizzazione e quindi sono andato nella cartella del profilo e ho cancellato i più recenti file con estensione .msf - poi ho cancellato anche il file global-messages-db.sqlite Purtroppo adesso ad ogni riavvio sembra partire il processo di indicizzazione ma si blocca dopo 2/3 secondi senza lasciarmi il tempo di fare nulla Ho circa 7/8 mail alcune molto "pesanti" - tutte in IMAP per fortuna ma vorrei evitare di dover reinstallare tutto. Cosa mi consigliate? grazie per il tempo e per chi saprà aiutarmi

title: Filter for Emails
content:
Hi there

I am running Thunderbird, latest version, with several eMail accounts. I like the use of filters for each eMail account, so I can save important emails to my local folders. It turns out that I have very similar if not equal filter settings for different email accounts moving my emails into the same folder: Example Newsletter emails from different accounts to the same local folder.

Would it be possible to create one filter that searches all email accounts to do things (i.e. moving, attaching tags) to those emails?

Second use case: while manually scanning/reading emails tagging them, later having a global filter to move tagged emails to desired/configured folder.

I'd appreciate an answer.

Cheers Michael

title: No “Apply filters on selected messages” menu item in Thunderbird 115.3.1 on XUbuntu 23.04
content:
Hello,

I have a long list of filters on a quite busy GMail account (>1000 messages per day). Traditionally there have been many times that new messages were eventually marked as not new because a refresh happened before the message filters were complete, so the very first filter marks all new messages with a specific label, and then all the next filters work on that specific filter, removing it when done.

For filters that didn't get applied to new messages for any reason, I only had to mark all the not-handled messages, tag them with the specific tag and then select “Run filters on selected messages”. This menu item does not exist anymore, and to replicate the functionality I have to go to the filters dialog, select all filters and then Run selected filters on my Inbox.

How can I have the menuitem “Run filters on selected messages” without needing to open the filters dialog?

title: Vložení podpisu (nebo textu v HTML formátu ze souboru) do rozepsaného emailu
content:
Dobrý den.

Už jsem skoro přešel na Thunderbild, ale zastavila mě jedna chybějící funkce.

Vím, že Thunderbild umožňuje přiřadit "automatický" podpis ke každému připojenému účtu. Mohu použít jak prostý text, tak drobné formátování v HTML anebo použít HTML soubor s potřebným formátováním. To je OK.

Co ale hledám, je vkládání podpisů přímo v otevřeném emailu a to k aktuálně postavenému kurzoru. Asi by se to nemuselo jmenovat vložení podpisů, ale třeba vložení šablony, neb to lépe vystihuje požadované.

Jde o to, že mám připraveno hodně různých odpovědí či jiných textů, kde vložení HTML textu včetně formátování usnadní rutinní práci. Zde jsem nic takového nenašel.

Přikládám obrázek jak je to elegantně řešeno ve Windows Live Mail 2012, kde jednoduše mám seznam různých podpisů (asi 25) a každý se odkazuje na určitý HTML soubor nebo prostý text. Následně výběrem požadovaného podpisu se vloží požadovaný text na požadované místo.

Dokud toto nebude dostupné v Thunderbuildu, pak práce v takovém emailovém klientu by pro mne nebyl posunem vpřed. Ale věřím, že toto naprogramovat je velmi jednoduché a pro uživatele to je velkým přínosem.

S pozdravem Pavel Cuc

---

Hello.

I almost switched to Thunderbild, but one missing feature stopped me.

I know that Thunderbild allows you to assign an "automatic" signature to each connected account. I can either use plain text, minor formatting in HTML or use an HTML file with the necessary formatting. That's OK.

But what I'm looking for is to insert signatures directly in the open email and to the currently positioned cursor. I guess it shouldn't be called insert signatures, but maybe insert template, because that better describes what is required.

The thing is, I have a lot of different replies or other texts prepared where inserting HTML text including formatting will make the routine easier. I haven't found anything like that here.

I'm attaching a picture of how this is elegantly handled in Windows Live Mail 2012, where I simply have a list of different signatures (about 25) and each refers to a specific HTML file or plain text. Then selecting the desired signature inserts the desired text in the desired location.

Until this is available in Thunderbuild, then working in such an email client would not be a step forward for me. But I believe this is very easy to program and a great benefit to the user.

Regards Pavel Cuc
creator: pcuc66

Egy másik eszközön a teljesen jól működik frissítést követően is a levelező program (azon Win7 van). A következőket ellenőriztük: postafiók beállítások (nem kerültek változtatásra); vírusvédelem és tűzfal kikapcsolása után sem töltötte le az üzeneteket; levelezésben alkalmazott szűrők kikapcsolása sem oldotta meg a problémát. title: Error recieving email (but NOT sending) from MS Office 365 "...responded: User is Authenticated but not connected."
content:
On October 12, Thunderbird updated to latest version. I have two email accounts in it - one GMail and one through Go Daddy, which uses MS Office 365.

At the same time, I changed my password for Office 365.

Now when I try to pick up e-mail, I get a returned message "The current operation on 'Inbox' did not succeed. The mail server account ##.########.com responded: User is authenticated but not connected"

My outgoing email from same account works flawlessly - only the incoming fails. I tried changing the saved password (Setting-> Passwords-> Saved Passwords and editing there, also deleting the entire email saved passwords and letting it populate (although it DOESN'T ask, it populates with something else. I have also tried setting the "network.dns.disableIPv6" to "True" to no avail.

I called GoDaddy, and they are telling me that Thunderbird no longer works with Office 365 because it is IMAP driven and O365 is Exchange server. This makes no sense to me because before the Thunderbird update, up until 5:30 yesterday evening. T Bird worked FLAWLESSLY.

I believe that it has something to do with how O365 authenticates with Go Daddy - it is not done as a personal account but rather as a school or enterprise... so when I loaded this address into BlueMail on my phone, it goes to the GoDaddy server for authentication.

Please HELP - I LOVE my Thunderbird, I do NOT believe GoDaddy because this worked FINE before the update and password reset.
creator: eugenejoliva

outgoing- mail.brighthouse.com 587 SSL/TLS Normal Password User name is my __.rr.com email address (not giving full address here)

title: Multiple Problems ith Thunderbird 115..3.1
content:
I upgraded to 115.3.1 from 102.15.1 this week. I do not understand the large increase in version number, but I have not done any searches. I have a number of complains with this new version.

1) I want to move one message to a Local Folder, and I get the message at the bottom "nn messages moved from Inbox to Tr.ash". 2) The font size in the window is smaller than it was with 102, and there is blank space on the right. Is there a way to increase the font size?

3) I read one mail message and I process it (delete it or save it in a Local Folder). Most of the time, the next message in the Inbox is opened. But sometimes the window advances to a message further down in the Inbox, and I then have to go back into the Inbox to access then next message I was planning on reading.

content:
Hello,

Is there a way to change what the icon buttons in TB Supernova do? There is a Get Mail button that polls all accounts for mail at the same time. is there a way to use that button to poll only one account at a time - rather than the little check mail icon that is there now?

Thanks!

title: How to remove display of number of unopened messages?
content: In Thunderbird 115.3.1 I don't want to see a number telling number of unopened messages in each folder (or make it much more subtle as before). Can I change View to not show it? Thank you.

title: twc.com account "junkmail" folder not identifiable as "junk" folder
content: I have a rarely-used Spectrum account that's served via mail.twc.com. Automatic setup doesn't work, but manual configuration does, and in that case the account's folders show up. However, what the account identifies as the "junkmail" folder isn't being flagged as "junk" (that is, with the appropriate icon, and not included in "read next"), and I can't find any way to tell Thunderbird otherwise (this used to be part of the account settings, but isn't any longer)
creator: jgackson

title: Message missing in imap inbox, visible in webmail.
content: Running 115.3.2 I have an IMAP account setup. A message received a few hours ago has disappeared from the inbox listing. I had seen in listed in the inbox for a brief time but now I have searched for it and it does not appear to be in any other folder. However, I CAN access the message using webmail in my browser. I have done a repair of the inbox but still don't see the message.

title: Upgrading (on Win 10) from vers 78
content: I've stuck with Mozilla since mid-1990's (since it was Netscape before vers 0.9). Been on T-bird for awhile after that and my last install was vers 78*. It just works. Now I'm interested in upgrading to the latest vers of TB (115). Looking for guidance/instructions on how to make the upgrade to latest version. Thanks for what your folks do.
creator: chrisncats

title: My Thunderbird "new mail" chime keeps going off but there is no new mail.
content: This started about ten days ago. I use Thunderbird on a Windows 20 desktop. I have three email accounts set up. Every few minutes the chime alerting to new mail bings on the least-used account and a little red bubble appears on the Thunderbird icon in the tray with the number of new emails -- sometime is says 2 0r 3, sometimes 30 or 40. But, none of the folders in this account have any new email. As soon as I click on the account header (which has turned blue to show new email) the number bubble disappears from the Thunderbird icon and the account header turns back to black. Then, a very few minutes later, the chime goes off again. I am stumped. Has anyone else experienced this?
creator: mark.abels

title: Calendars missing all data, "momentarily not available"
content:
Please afford me a little patience because I probably shouldn't even be using Thunderbird and I'm going to try and give as much info as possible about my problem.

OS: Windows 11 Thunderbird version: 115, 102, 91 IMAP

I have had my calendars lose all data temporarily but they eventually always came back within the day. But it has now been several days and the problem doesn't seem to be fixing itself anymore. I rely on these Calendars heavily for my job so I'm a bit anxious about them not working.

I have been googling and researching for two days now trying to find people with similar problems and so hopefully similar solutions but I have not had any luck getting to the root of the problem. A lot of the info out there is for when Lightning was still an extension or when syncing CalDav stuff. OR, whatever solution that was offered was done using linux commands and I'm on Windows. I've tried to attach screenshots of all the relevant info I can think of without just copy/pasting everything that appears in the console debugger thing.

If there's anything I can provide that might help with fixing this just let me know and I'll post it.

Thank you for reading this and anytime you spend looking into my issue. I appreciate it a ton.

Thank you,
creator: grantblack000

title: folder panel in 115.3.2 (64-bit), the option menu to select/remove folder sizes disappeared and won't come back
content: Updated to 115.3.2. While playing around with the customization features I clicked on the kebab menu at the top of the folder panel to add the total message count for each folder. This display matches my previous Thunderbird versions. Then I added the folder size and decided I didn't need or want that. But now can't turn it off because the kebab menu is gone and I can't figure out how to get it back. Any suggestions?
creator: knmlv04

title: Mozilla (Supernova) version 115.3.2 receiving emails but not sending.
content:
Hi all,

my Mozilla (Supernova) version 115.3.2 is receiving emails but not sending them. I have contacted my email service provider and they are unable to assist/ fix the problem - we have been changing the settings in the SMTP outgoing server and sending test emails each time, but this hasn't worked. I have added and removed Mozilla through my virus protection (AVG & Windows security) and sent emails, but this hasn't helped either.

For the record, I have an "oldish" computer that is however running Windows 10. I can only think of one thing and maybe my computer doesn't support this version of Supernova, but I am receiving emails as per normal?

I would appreciate it if someone could assist with this matter asap.

Kind Regards

Phil Muraca
creator: philip.muraca

title: Printing in Microsoft Thunderbird. I open a file in Thunderbird. Select PRINT and instead of PRINT it shows SAVE TO PDF. At the bottom of the it shows SAVE whereas previously I used to have PRINT. Please advise.

title: indirizzo Email del mittente
content:
Fino alla scorsa versione cera un "trucco" per vedere l'indirizzo Email del mittente. 

 (e cioè il componente aggiuntivo full_address_column-1.0.4-tb.xpi, che permetteva di aggiungere una colonna che mostrava  l'indirizzo Email del mittente).

Oggi non è più compatibile con l'ultimo aggiornamento di thunderbird. (?!)

Avete implementato un nuovo sistema per risolvere questo "problema"; oppure aggiornerete anche il relativo componente aggiuntivo?

Ricordo che non poter vedere il l'indirizzo e-mail del mittente è terribilmente scomodo e fastidioso, dal momento che gli spammer si nascondono dietro a quei nomi fasulli mostrati nolla colonna "mittente"!

Vi prego risolvete al più presto, Grazie.
creator: com.pere
